synopsis.text: Iyona Kawai might be the only bright spot in fifth-grader Honmaru Edojou's life, but even that's not enough to save him from the daily grind of being a pushover in Tokyo. That is, until the enchanting and powerful Magical Taruruuto-kun bursts forth from a magical tome. Based on Tatsuya Egawa's manga, this action-packed, magical, and comedic TV show follows Honmaru as he faces off against bullies like Jabao Jaba and navigates the trials and tribulations of growing up with his newfound magical ally. Get ready to laugh, cheer, and maybe even shed a tear as Honmaru learns to stand up for himself with the help of his supernatural friend.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
